short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Design your pages with custom CSS extension

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Redesign your favorite websites with AB Stylish, an actively developed and community-driven user styles manager.

Easily install custom themes from popular online repositories, or create, edit, and manage your own personalized CSS stylesheets.
